Package com.sun.enterprise.connectors.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdminObjectConfigParser
    Interface class of admin object interface parser methods.
    ConnectorConfigParser
    Interface class of connector configuration parser methods.
    MCFConfigParser
    Interface class of managed connection factory parser methods.
    MessageListenerConfigParser
    Interface class of managed connection factory parser methods.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminObjectConfigParserImpl
    This is AdminObject configuration parser.
    ClassLoadingUtility  
    ConnectionDefinitionUtils
    A simple class to get the properties of a ConnectionDefinition class , that could be overridden by the administrator during deployment.
    ConnectionPoolObjectsUtils
    This is an util class for creating poolObjects of the type ConnectorConnectionPool from ConnectorDescriptor and also using the default values.
    ConnectionPoolReconfigHelper  
    ConnectorClassLoader
    This class loader is responsible for loading standalone RAR files.
    ConnectorConfigParserFactory
    This is a factory class for the connector configuration parser classes.
    ConnectorConfigParserUtils
    This is an util class containing methods for parsing connector configurations present in ra.xml.
    ConnectorDDTransformUtils
    This is an util class pertaining to the connector deployment descriptor i.e ra.xml and sun-ra.xml.
    ConnectorJavaBeanValidator  
    ConnectorRARClassLoader
    ConnectorRARClassLoader finds classes and resources from a JAR file without exploding it.
    ConnectorTimerProxy  
    DriverLoader
    Driver Loader to load the jdbc drivers and get driver/datasource classnames by introspection.
    JarResourceExtractor
    JarResourceExtractor: JarResourceExtractor maps all resources included in a Zip or Jar file.
    MCFConfigParserImpl
    This is managed connection factory configuration parser.
    MessageListenerConfigParserImpl
    This is message listener configuration parser.
    PrintWriterAdapter
    PrintWriter adapter that will be used by resource adapters
    RARUtils
    This is a utility class to obtain the properties of a RA JavaBean housed in a RAR module/deployment dir, without exploding the RAR contents.
    RAWriterAdapter
    Writer that will be given to / used by MCF, MCs of resource adapter
    PrintWriter will be set during MCF initialization
    ResourceAdapterConfigParserImpl
    This is Resource Adapter configuration parser.
    ResourcesUtil  
    SecurityMapUtils
    This is class performs the task of adding/deleting and updating the security maps to the connector registry.
    SetMethodAction
    Executes setter methods on java beans.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConnectionPoolReconfigHelper.ReconfigAction
